title: TN_INPUT_SELECT_POPUP
description:
TN_INPUT_SELECT_POPUP is used to manage a selection of 

texts, by displaying a pop-up dialogue. This must be set *.IN_TYPE = 3.

The item will be provided as *.in_X and *.in_Y. Every entry line can be 

provided with a title text. With *.in_Title_Y_Ofset and *.in_Title_X_Ofset 

the position relative to the element coordinates is expressed. The color 

can be determined with *.by_Title_Attr, and the text by *.st_Title_String. If 

a tool tip should appear at the element *. st_Input_ToolTip the text hast to 

be specifed.

The selection of texts will be handed over in *.st_Input_Data. The text 

element should be separated from each other by the character '#'.

If the focus is on an element, using the Enter / Return key selection dialog 

can be activated.

With the cursor up/down can be changed between the individual elements. 

If the beginning or the end of the list will be reachted, it continues at the 

opposite side.

The text-element is connected by means *.st_Input_Mask, meaning that 

the output text length are afected later.

By pressing the Enter / Return key is the text of the selected element is 

passed to *. st_Input_String and *. bo_Input_Entered = TRUE. The input 

fag must be reset after receive by the user.

An active selection (selection dialog) can always be canceled with the 

Escape key.
name: TN_INPUT_SELECT_POPUP

input.name: in_Type
input.description: Type of the input selection dialog. Must be set to 3.

input.name: in_Y
input.description: Vertical position of the input dialog.

input.name: in_X
input.description: Horizontal position of the input dialog.

input.name: by_Attr_mF
input.description: Color attributes for the selected state, separated by '#'.

input.name: by_Attr_oF
input.description: Color attributes for the unselected state, separated by '#'.

input.name: st_Input_ToolTip
input.description: Tooltip text that appears when the element is focused.

input.name: in_Title_Y_Ofset
input.description: Vertical offset for the title text position.

input.name: in_Title_X_Ofset
input.description: Horizontal offset for the title text position.

input.name: by_Title_Attr
input.description: Color attributes for the title text.

input.name: st_Title_String
input.description: Title text displayed on the dialog.

input.name: st_Input_Mask
input.description: Mask that affects the output text length.

input.name: st_Input_Data
input.description: The text elements to be selected, separated by '#'.

output.name: st_Input_String
output.description: The string output of the selected element.

output.name: bo_Input_Entered
output.description: Indicates whether an input has been selected (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

return_value.description: This function does not return a value.
